content:
HtmlInputGenericControl Class

In this Article

Defines the methods, properties, and events for server-side access to the HTML5 input element.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.DefaultEvent("ServerChange")]
[System.Web.UI.ValidationProperty("Value")]
public class HtmlInputGenericControl : System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • HtmlControl

  • HtmlInputGenericControl

Methods summary

LoadPostData(String,NameValueCollection)

Processes the postback data for the HTML5 input element.
OnPreRender(EventArgs)

Raises the PreRender event.
OnServerChange(EventArgs)

Raises the ServerChange event.
RaisePostDataChangedEvent()

Invokes the stem.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange* method when the posted data for the HtmlInputGenericControl element has changed.

Events summary

ServerChange

Occurs when the content of the HTML5 input element changes between posts to the server.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(String,NameValueCollection)

When implemented in a derived class, processes postback data for an HTML5 input element.
IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent()

When implemented in a derived class, invokes the stem.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange* method when the posted data for the HTML5 input element has changed.

Constructors

  • HtmlInputGenericControl()

    Initializes a new instance of the HtmlInputGenericControl class.

    public HtmlInputGenericControl ();
  • HtmlInputGenericControl(String)

    Initializes a new instance of the HtmlInputGenericControl class based on the specified type.

    public HtmlInputGenericControl (string type);

    Parameters

    • type
      String

      The type of the control.

Methods

  • LoadPostData(String,NameValueCollection)

    Processes the postback data for the HTML5 input element.

    protected virtual bool LoadPostData (string postDataKey, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection postCollection);

    Parameters

    • postDataKey
      String

      The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.

    • postCollection
      NameValueCollection

      The collection of all posted values.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the posted content differs from the content in a previous postback; otherwise, false.

  • OnPreRender(EventArgs)

    Raises the PreRender event.

    protected override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      EventArgs

      The event data.

  • OnServerChange(EventArgs)

    Raises the ServerChange event.

    protected virtual void OnServerChange (EventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      EventArgs

      The event data.

  • RaisePostDataChangedEvent()

    Invokes the stem.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange* method when the posted data for the HtmlInputGenericControl element has changed.

    protected virtual void RaisePostDataChangedEvent ();

Events

  • ServerChange

    Occurs when the content of the HTML5 input element changes between posts to the server.

    public event EventHandler ServerChange;

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(String,NameValueCollection)

    When implemented in a derived class, processes postback data for an HTML5 input element.

    bool IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData (string postDataKey, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection postCollection);

    Parameters

    • postDataKey
      String

      The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.

    • postCollection
      NameValueCollection

      The collection of all posted values.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the state of the HTML5 input element changes because of the postback; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the HtmlInputGenericControl instance is cast to an IPostBackDataHandler interface.

  • IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent()

    When implemented in a derived class, invokes the stem.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange* method when the posted data for the HTML5 input element has changed.

    void IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the HtmlInputGenericControl instance is cast to an IPostBackDataHandler interface.
